version_description:
- Fixed crash while loading maps on SHealth Running activity view dashboard
- Fixed some multi-language translation issues and improve stability
- Fixed timezone localization issue that affect some features on Gear
- Improve SVoice accuracy by fixing issues

- Fixed Spanish language issue where showing string ID's rather localised values
- Fixed localization issue which affecting on Chinese simplified & traditional language
- Fixed some multi-language translation issues
- Include general bug fixing and improve stability

- Fixed localization issue which affecting on Chinese simplified & traditional language
- Fixed some multi-language translation issues
- Include general bug fixing and improve stability

- UX design improvement
- Download app from Samsung Gear store through Wi-Fi
- Show detail status of battery, Storage and Ram usage of Gear device
- Manage Gear Power saving mode
- Clean-up Gear Storage & Ram
- Support Cloud backup and restore
- Promotional banner and suggested apps list
- Added FAQ in contact us
- Include critical bug fixing and improve stability

* Some new features will not be available if the application is connected with Gear S2 and Gear S3. All features will be available with Gear Sport.

1. Added Support for Galaxy Watch
2. New features supported with Galaxy Watch - Watch Display Settings, Sound and vibration, Some Advanced settings, Find my phone

The former Samsung Gear S, now brings you support for the brand new Galaxy Watch along with Gear S2, S3 and Sport.

Additionally this version delivers
1. New features supported with Galaxy Watch - Watch Display Settings, Sound and vibration, Some Advanced settings, Find my phone
2. General bug fixing and improved stability
